com.rift.coad.audit
Interface AuditTrailManagerMBean

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface AuditTrailManagerMBean
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface exposes the bean management functionality.

query

java.util.List<LogEntry> query(java.lang.String hostname,
                               java.lang.String source,
                               java.lang.String user,
                               java.lang.String status,
                               java.lang.String correlationId,
                               java.lang.String externalId,
                               int maxRows)
                               throws AuditTrailException,
                                      java.rmi.RemoteException
This method is designed to supply a means to query the audit trail logs.

Parameters:
hostname - The name of the host to store
source - The source of the request.
user - The user the request has been made by.
status - The status of the request.
correlationId - The correlation id for the log entry.
externalId - The external id for the request.
maxRows - The max number of rows that can be returned by the request.
Returns:
The list of log entries.
Throws:
AuditTrailException
java.rmi.RemoteException
